discourse_list.title: CoreDevs ETH1x / Istanbul Meeting July Poll & Feedback

content.content: We’re in the midst of sending out wrap up emails and links from last weeks CoreDevs Berlin meetings. Here is the email that went out: https://md.spade.builders/lXX8_RxoRGyr6zunhmTuqQ Please also use this thread for feedback for those that attended, those that viewed the livestream, or those with other comments   Potential Next Meeting Here are two polls to gather feedback on timing and location of a next meeting. We have one volunteer @meknab who has said she can help out on the ground in Seattle or NYC. If you want to volunteer in a location or in general help out, leave a comment. More links and action items to be added to this post or in the comments.  Where we would you prefer to attend a next meeting? Pick two.     Seattle New York Somewhere in Canada Somewhere in Europe Elsewhere     0 voters      When would be good timing to attend? Pick one.     Week of July 22 Week of July 29 I don’t care about meeting in person I can’t make it     0 voters
should there be some options in August?

Feel free to propose! I picked the dates because I think you had DEFCON conflicts at some point? August 14th is Testnet deploy, so I didn’t want to conflict too closely to that. Essentially part of this would be to have clients & testnet folks coordinate. Here’s also what I think the topics would be:  work on testnet / main net Istanbul deploys – so more let’s get prepped for testing, interop, and so on kick off for April 2020 – pick a name, get dates from @shemnon Cheesy Hardfork Schedule, and essentially solidify what the next HF is host working group sessions – now that we have a list of WGs https://en.ethereum.wiki/eth1 we can ask those people to organize and just help host them  Also: to state again – I’m floating this as a proposed option. Should CoreDevs meet ~3-4 times per year, with the assumption that DevCon has meetings as well?
boris:  en would be good timing to attend?   What does “Week of” mean?  2 days?  5 days? About 20 family members converge on my place August 2, and we need time to get ready.
It means some TBD days in that week that will likely be a max of 2 days.
I can help out on the ground in Seattle.
